title: Shift Your Perspective and Change Your Life
description:
Today on Dear Gabby I did something I’ve never done before. I took one caller only, and coached her in an extended one-on-one workshop. This young mother was battling cancer for the second time, and I knew that her courageous  story would help you—no matter what your circumstances are. Listen in to witness a quantum shift taking place live.
 
RESOURCES

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

 
MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver lessons, guided meditations and community connection. I also have a 21-day challenge planned for you each quarter! The Miracle Membership is easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3oW93of 

 

My new book, Happy Days; The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. is now available for preorder. There is bravery in sharing our life stories, struggles and triumphs—and these are mine. This is the most vulnerable book I’ve written yet, and it’s also my most important spiritual work. I hope it serves you greatly. DearGabby.com/HappyDays

 

MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES:

If you need a little more support, here are more resources: https://bit.ly/31SD4Nn

 

PARTNERS:

 

To start building your wealth, and get your first $5,000 managed for FREE, for life, go to wealthfront.com/gabby

 

Ready to shake up your protein Ritual? My listeners get 10% off during your first 3 months at ritual.com/DEARGABBY.

 

You can shop on their website www.stripeandstare.com with an exclusive Dear Gabby code – GABBY for 20% off their range. Available at major retailers such as Revolve, Bloomingdales and Shopbop.

 

Check out Mel Robbins' new podcast Here's Exactly What To Do only on Audible. Visit audible.com/whattodo.

 

Produced by Dear Media.
